rules_text:
Bioengineered Opus enters with three +1/+1 counters, a lifelink counter, and a vigilance counter on it.
When Bioengineered Opus dies, for each creature you control, you may move a counter from Bioengineered Opus onto that creature.
flavor_text: [i]Home-grown and remarkably modular—one of the Laboratories' finest works.[/i]
